title: disclosure
description: The disclosure request made by an inspector on the velocity newtwork. It describes credential types wanted and (in the future) predicate information as well as terms and conditions for usage of the data

type.description: The credential type to be disclosed

types.description: To be expanded. Predicates will be added and associated with each credential type. Enables expression of expressions that limit the kinds of credential requested

purpose.description: purpose is a summary of the description

duration.description: duration can be a number of days (5d), weeks (12w), months (6m) or years (7y)

createdAt.description: recommended not to be set. defaults to now UTC time

updatedAt.description: recommended not to be set. defaults to now UTC time

activationDate.description: can be configured to delay activation to some later time

deactivationDate.description: can be configured to deactivate at a predetermined time or to be deactivated on demand by setting this to now
